title: libert19
author: libert19
created_time: November 02, 2023, 12:42:03 AMLast edit: November 02, 2023, 01:04:18 AM by libert19
content: Details here: https://pyth.network/blog/pyth-network-retrospective-airdropEligibility checker: https://airdrop.pyth.network/ Pretty broad criteria, also one of few projects where nft holders and discord roles are given attention in the airdrop distribution. Claim date to be announced.

comments.author: dbshck
comments.body: It appears that only my Solana wallet qualifies, despite my extensive activity across various EVM-compatible platforms. Most likely none of the dApps I've engaged with are using Pyth as Chainlink is the preferred choice usually. Still better than nothing. If $PYTH can get the same FDV as $LINK, we could potentially see $1 per $PYTH token. That's the optimistic scenario. Realistically though, I would estimate the price to settle in the range of $0.1 to $0.5.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 02, 2023, 12:42:03 AM...Pretty broad criteria, also one of few projects where nft holders and discord roles are given attention in the airdrop distribution. I checked all my working wallets, and did not find one that would meet the criteria for receiving airdrop. Surprisingly, despite the "Pretty broad criteria", even the wallets I had previously received airdrop on from Arbitrum, Optimism and Celestia didn't qualify. Did you get the right to this airdrop yourself?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: dbshck on November 04, 2023, 03:02:13 AMIt appears that only my Solana wallet qualifies, despite my extensive activity across various EVM-compatible platforms. Most likely none of the dApps I've engaged with are using Pyth as Chainlink is the preferred choice usually. Still better than nothing. If $PYTH can get the same FDV as $LINK, we could potentially see $1 per $PYTH token. That's the optimistic scenario. Realistically though, I would estimate the price to settle in the range of $0.1 to $0.5.I had to double check your math as i i haven't seem link for ages and didn't realize that link was as high as that in the marketcap. But your estimation checks out.I am not sure on what rate the supply is growing on this one, but if the airdrop is 900m tokens, and the marketcap is counted from circulating supply, then you only need $900m marketcap for this to have $1 per token. That would put Pyth on 52th place in the coinmarketcap. And from what i've read about this, it could easily happen.Naturally i am rooting for fraction of it as i wasn't eligible for the airdrop and i want to buy. I missed out because this was the first time i even heard about Pyth. There has been too many of them to keep track of, but i am interested now. But still i am not going to pay overvalued prices.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on November 04, 2023, 05:05:30 PMQuote from: libert19 on November 02, 2023, 12:42:03 AM...Pretty broad criteria, also one of few projects where nft holders and discord roles are given attention in the airdrop distribution. I checked all my working wallets, and did not find one that would meet the criteria for receiving airdrop. Surprisingly, despite the "Pretty broad criteria", even the wallets I had previously received airdrop on from Arbitrum, Optimism and Celestia didn't qualify. Did you get the right to this airdrop yourself?Yes, I got for Injective and EVM. I didn't get for osmosis, which I was expecting because I'm active user of the osmosis ecosystem, when I asked same in their discord regarding ineligibility, they told me the dapps I used there must not be using Pyth as their data provider.

comments.author: dbshck
comments.body: Kucoin created an OTC market for the upcoming $PYTH token. It's currently trading at $0.3, equivalent to $3B FDV which is around 20% of $LINK FDV.  https://twitter.com/SolBulletin/status/1724426462315372704What do you guys think? Are you expecting a higher or lower price after the launch?

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Update. If you were not eligible before, check again, you might be. QuoteNovember 15, 2023: The snapshot for on-chain activity by DeFi users of dApps using Pyth Network was revised for greater inclusivity. An additional ~55M PYTH has been added to the overall airdrop, bringing the total and final allocation to approximately 255M PYTH Tokens.I thought this additional amount will increase allocation for already eligible ones too but it didn't.

Most likely none of the dApps I've engaged with are using Pyth as Chainlink is the preferred choice usually. Still better than nothing. If $PYTH can get the same FDV as $LINK, we could potentially see $1 per $PYTH token. That's the optimistic scenario. Realistically though, I would estimate the price to settle in the range of $0.1 to $0.5.Although I'm not eligible at all because I had checked my wallets in all the chains and I though may be I select one of them and that would be available some tokens for me. But when I go through the EVM chains it didn't have any tokens then I go through the Solana chain to check it then it also showing zero then I go through the Keplr wallets and checked the remaining address  also through the Martian Wallet but having a little bad luck I didn't eligible in any of the criteria even I didn't remembered when the airdrop came and what was the criteria we were all supposed to fulfil for it.

comments.author: irsykes
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 16, 2023, 08:24:44 AMUpdate. If you were not eligible before, check again, you might be. QuoteNovember 15, 2023: The snapshot for on-chain activity by DeFi users of dApps using Pyth Network was revised for greater inclusivity. An additional ~55M PYTH has been added to the overall airdrop, bringing the total and final allocation to approximately 255M PYTH Tokens.I thought this additional amount will increase allocation for already eligible ones too but it didn't. I had high hopes for new news but didn't get anything either. Have you ever interacted with Defi Dapps requirements or is this just for random users. and right before the bull season comes the potential projects issue strategies for long term interest once the bitcoin halving is over next year this will increase significantly

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 16, 2023, 08:24:44 AMUpdate. If you were not eligible before, check again, you might be. ..Obviously, the team has decided to increase the number of participants for airdrop, but even with these new conditions, none of my wallets are eligible. Nevertheless I wish those who get this airdrop, to sell it at the highest, and not to be tormented by Fomo afterwards.

comments.body: After what happened in FTX Exchange I already pulled out my funds in the Solana chain network.Here's what I will get, it's kinda but I'm already thankful. On their EVM, I really don't have any. I don't remember on some DeFi I used, there's Pyth network.I remember this Pyth network project in Solana before, glad they will have airdrop.

comments.author: God bless u
comments.body: I used Solona Dapp but honestly first time i am hearing this name. I checked my EVM and Solona wallet by connecting, unfortunately not eligible for this airdrop. @dbshck is so lucky and got huge airdrop. I hope the price will be above 0.5$. Unofficial trading already started in Kucoin. If anybody want to sell then pre listing sell options is also available but I will recommend to hold. People are selling below 0.4$ price.I am eligible for Solona another airdrop comes from Jupiter Exchange. If anybody interected then he is eligible 100 percent.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 18, 2023, 02:46:04 AMQuote from: God bless u on November 17, 2023, 04:57:03 PMI used Solona Dapp but honestly first time i am hearing this name. I checked my EVM and Solona wallet by connecting, unfortunately not eligible for this airdrop. @dbshck is so lucky and got huge airdrop. I hope the price will be above 0.5$. Unofficial trading already started in Kucoin. If anybody want to sell then pre listing sell options is also available but I will recommend to hold. People are selling below 0.4$ price. I'm not aware how kucoin otc works, do you need kyc? Although the user was not required to undergo KYC, I have not yet provided them with an update regarding the recent change that transpired on KuCoin. Nonetheless, it is worth mentioning that KuCoin is highly regarded as a user-friendly exchange platform, especially in comparison to Binance. As long as you were not coming from the restricted country and you will be fine but i have my accounts have KYCed. The pre market is pretty much the same like IOU. The price may be different after it will be officially listed by the exchange site. This is also happening with TIA. The price when it enters exchange site was different compared with the pre market.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: I have being trying to access the airdrop page but keep getting this Error 451: unavailable for legal Reasons but my country is not part of the countries excluded from the list. I think Pyth will do well, especially if Solana network will regain is mojo, there are big names behind the project and can't see this trade  at least 50% of the Link market cap in future, but it is better to study the tokenomics very well
